about_the_game:
Infernal Elements


In a desolate underground world ruled by The Elementals, a new being of fire is born.

Take control of the newest Fire Elemental on a mission to find their place and confront their predecessor. Team up with an unlikely ally, The Water Elemental, on a mission to escape the underground which you are vital for. Work together as you go through a series of boss fights each tougher than the last.

This bullet-hell boss rush game will test your patience as you prove to them all how capable you are.

Features:

  • Top-down bullet-hell based gameplay
  • Multiple boss fights based around elements
  • Each fight with their own unique twist
  • An overarching story revolving around The Fire Elemental's journey

name: Infernal Elements Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: A bullet hell, boss rush game, where you control the newest Fire Elemental on his journey fighting against the elements of the underground.
